name: CPS_3_5_Support_for_Research_Protocols_Relative_to_Individual_Patient_Care
title: CPS.3.5 Support for Research Protocols Relative to Individual Patient Care (Function)
description: Provide support for the management of patients enrolled in research protocols.
purpose: The clinician is presented with appropriate protocols for patients participating in research studies, and is supported in the management and tracking of study participants.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to present protocols for patients enrolled in research studies.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to capture, maintain and render research study protocols.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD conform to function [[AS.9.1]] (Support Financial Plan Enrollment), to enable participation in research studies.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to analyze and maintain patients participating in research studies.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#05
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to capture and maintain appropriate details of patient condition and response to treatment as required for patients enrolled in research studies.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[CP.3.3]] (Manage Clinical Documents and Notes) to capture patient condition and response to treatment.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#07
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture, maintain and render research subject disposition information including date/time and trial phase/cycle of study completion/discontinuation as discrete elements.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD determine patients eligible for known active clinical research protocols as defined by inclusion and exclusion criteria.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#09
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD present information notifying staff of patient's eligibility for known active clinical research protocols as defined by inclusion and exclusion criteria.

statement.label: CPS.3.5#10
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture research protocol deviation information, including any verbatim text of protocol deviation.
